law.catch_line: Subject to the limitations in this section and § 6-314 of this title, a master electrician who is l...

text.section: Subject to the limitations in this section and § 6-314 of this title, a master electrician who is licensed by the State Board and who assigns a local license to a person who engages in the business of providing electrical services may change that assignment.
On payment of the change of status fee, the State Board shall issue a new license to the applicant.
The State Board shall give each local jurisdiction notice of any change in the status of a local license obtained by the use of a State license that will affect the status of the State license.
